io.micronaut.core.annotation

Interface AnnotationMetadataDelegate

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AnnotatedElement, AnnotationMetadata, AnnotationMetadataProvider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BeanDefinition<T>, BeanDefinitionMethodReference<T,R>, DelegatingBeanDefinition<T>, DelegatingExecutableMethod<T,R>, DisposableBeanDefinition<T>, ExecutableMethod<T,R>, ExecutionHandle<R>, InitializingBeanDefinition<T>, InvocationContext<T,R>, MethodBasedRouteMatch<R>, MethodExecutionHandle<R>, MethodInvocationContext<T,R>, MethodReference<T,R>, ProxyBeanDefinition<T>, UriRouteMatch<R>, ValidatedBeanDefinition<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBeanDefinition, AbstractExecutableMethod, io.micronaut.ast.groovy.visitor.AbstractGroovyElement, AbstractJavaElement, AbstractParametrizedBeanDefinition, AnnotationMetadataReference, GroovyClassElement, GroovyFieldElement, GroovyMethodElement, InterceptorChain, JavaClassElement, MethodInterceptorChain

    public interface AnnotationMetadataDelegate
extends AnnotationMetadataProvider, AnnotationMetadata
    An interface that can be implemented by other classes that delegate the resolution of the AnnotationMetadata to the AnnotationMetadataProvider.getAnnotationMetadata() method.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface io.micronaut.core.annotation.AnnotationMetadata
